body_html: Thanks, I do use the model_dir param and it works. I meant to ask about the ability to save the execution graph as well, not just the weights. Such that I can send the model file to someone and they can load it and run it without having to send the python code with it. I believe that's what TensorFlowEstimator.save() does, right? Or am I misunderstanding it.

body: Thanks, I do use the model_dir param and it works. I meant to ask about the ability to save the execution graph as well, not just the weights.
